sentences.en: As writers, they cherish economical, and witty phrases.
sentences.cn: 他们在写作上喜欢用简洁机智的词句.

sentences.en: Cherish the memory of those days in Paris.
sentences.cn: 怀念在巴黎的岁月。

sentences.en: He cherished his privacy.
sentences.cn: 他很注重自己的隐私。

sentences.en: He genuinely loved and cherished her.
sentences.cn: 他真爱并珍惜过她。

sentences.en: his most cherished possession
sentences.cn: 他最珍爱的物品

sentences.en: I cherish for you the liveliest feeling of affection and gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我对你怀有最强烈的爱和感激之情.

sentences.en: I cherish the memory of that day.
sentences.cn: 我珍惜那一天的回忆。

sentences.en: I shall evermore cherish the memory of the patriotic poet.
sentences.cn: 我将永远怀念这位爱国诗人.

sentences.en: In marriage, a man promises to cherish his wife.
sentences.cn: 在婚姻中，男人承诺要爱护妻子。

sentences.en: Know how it feeIs to Iose the memories you want to cherish?
sentences.cn: 知道失去你最珍惜的记忆是什么感觉?

sentences.en: Managers seem to cherish'soft " information.
sentences.cn: 管理者们似乎对 “ 软 ” 信息怀有好感.

sentences.en: Only the one who had tasted all the joys and sorrows of life and had gone through all the happiness and suffering of the world, can really understand the intension of happiness and cherish every happy time.
sentences.cn: 只有尝遍生活的酸甜苦辣、历尽人间喜怒哀乐的人，才真正懂得幸福的内涵、珍惜幸福的点滴时光。

sentences.en: Overseas Chinese cherish the memory of their home land.
sentences.cn: 侨胞想念祖国.

sentences.en: People always cherish the memory of the national hero.
sentences.cn: 人们永远怀念这位民族英雄.

sentences.en: Some day all progressive mankind will cherish his memory.
sentences.cn: 有一天整个进步的人类都会敬仰他的英名.

sentences.en: Some men cherish the state's propertiesvery very much.
sentences.cn: 有些人是非常爱护公家的财物.

sentences.en: The president will cherish the memory of this visit to Ohio.
sentences.cn: 总统将铭记这次俄亥俄之行。

sentences.en: We must cherish experience acquired at the cost of blood.
sentences.cn: 我们必须珍惜用鲜血换来的经验.

sentences.en: We support the army and cherish the people.
sentences.cn: 我们拥军爱民.

sentences.en: We, too, cherish the opportunity to participate in the decision - making process.
sentences.cn: 我们也珍视参加决策过程的机会.

sentences.en: You may not cherish it, but I do.
sentences.cn: 你不希罕, 我可希罕呢.

trans.tran_cn: 珍惜，怀念（过去），抱有（希望）
trans.tran_en: to love someone or something very much and take care of them well
to love someone or something very much and take care of them well
